page.title: 11GAMES IN STRACHAN
page.content: The children were asked to write about their favourite games. They play{imaginative games based on {T.V. programmes}such as A TEAM, DANGER MOUSE and BATMAN AND ROBIN. {Skipping is very popular.}One skipping is:{Bumper car,bumper car, number 48. {I took it round the corner}(we have to go round the person and jump in the rope) { SLAM on the brakes,make no mistakes (and then we say) { 5,10,15,20..}(and skip until we are tired or make a mistake.){ Other games are tug of war,postman pat,hide and seek,horses (children pretend to be horses harnessed with ropes and driven by others.)Football is popular and various board games such as snakes & ladders, super ted and guess a shape. {Boys}play with tractors etc. {girls with Barbie dolls and My Little Pony.
